hero.introduction: Feeling lazy today, I just want to retire. /n Currently pursuing my Bachelor in 'Biochemistry and Molecular Biology' and also experienced with Web Development (primarily ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Postgresql) and looking for opportunnity to combine my skills from both worlds and make the magic happen./n Also, I love to automate the boring works using N8N workflows for small to medium businesses
